name: Kafir
description:
IF YOU EXPERIENCE PROBLEMS WITH HTML5 VERSION, PLEASE TRY THE BINARY VERSION! THANKS!

If you play in the browser, the game will be saved in local storage

WASD / Left Stick / Arrows  = Move

Space / A (XBox) / X (DualShock) = Jump

Key B / Key Z / X (Xbox) / Square (DualShock)  = Attack

Shift / R2 = Dash (You need to find it first!)

E / R1 = Interact

F / L1 = Use Potion (You need to buy some first!)

TAB / L2 = View Map

Programming
